definitions.title: Def
definitions.body: [[קול]] (√ of foll.; As. kâlu, speak, call, cry (Tel Am. lament), kûlu, speech; Ar. qa0la (w) say, qawlun word; Eth. q4l: sound, voice,and so Aram. [[קָלָא]] qolo0; Ph. [[קל]] voice, so Npun. [[קאל]], sf. [[קולא]]; SI:2 sound, voice; NH [[קוֹל]] noise, [[בֵּת קוֹל]] = echo).
